H0.text: The line 'The mirror crack'd from side to side' comes from which poem. The Lady of the Lake

H1.text: The line 'The mirror crack'd from side to side' comes from which poem. Endymion

H2.text: The line 'The mirror crack'd from side to side' comes from which poem. The Eve of St. Agnes

H3.text: The line 'The mirror crack'd from side to side' comes from which poem. Shalott

A4.text: The line 'The mirror crack'd from side to side' is from Alfred Tennyson's poem 'The Lady of Shalott'.
